stdout:
Table	Create Table
interviews	CREATE TABLE `interviews` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `applicationId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `recruiterId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `candidateId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `jobId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `scheduledAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `duration` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '60',
  `type` enum('phone','video','in-person','ai-interview') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'video',
  `status` enum('scheduled','in-progress','completed','cancelled','no-show') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'scheduled',
  `meetingLink` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `location` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `recordingUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `aiEvaluationScore` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `aiEvaluationReport` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `interviewerNotes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `candidateFeedback` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `videoMeetingId` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `videoJoinUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `videoStartUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `videoPassword` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `videoProvider` enum('zoom','teams','none') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'none',
  `reminder24hSent` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `reminder1hSent` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `candidateReminder24hSent` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0',
  `candidateReminder1hSent` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `interviews_applicationId_applications_id_fk` (`applicationId`),
  KEY `interviews_recruiterId_recruiters_id_fk` (`recruiterId`),
  KEY `interviews_candidateId_candidates_id_fk` (`candidateId`),
  KEY `interviews_jobId_jobs_id_fk` (`jobId`),
  CONSTRAINT `interviews_applicationId_applications_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`applicationId`) REFERENCES `myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA`.`applications` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `interviews_recruiterId_recruiters_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`recruiterId`) REFERENCES `myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA`.`recruiters` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `interviews_candidateId_candidates_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`candidateId`) REFERENCES `myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA`.`candidates` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `interviews_jobId_jobs_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`jobId`) REFERENCES `myxzroeDB4HgZWmTgbS8PA`.`jobs` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
